links.title: A Peek Into The Markets: US Stock Futures Gain; Presidential Election In Focus
links.description: Pre-open movers U.S. stock futures traded higher in early pre-market trade following a sharp decline in the previous week due to resurgence of Covid-19 pandemic and the uncertainties around the presidential election. Investors are awaiting earnings from Estee Lauder Companies Inc (NYSE: EL), Charter Communications Inc (NASDAQ: CHTR), Paypal Holdings Inc (NASDAQ: PYPL), Clorox Co (NYSE: CLX) and US Foods Holding Corp (NYSE: USFD).

links.title: Charter +4.9% as Q3 surprises with profit beat, added video subscribers
links.description: Charter Communications is up 4.9% in early going after its Q3 earnings easily cleared profit expectations and featured strong operating metrics, including hefty broadband subscriber additions and - an industry rarity - growth in video subs.

messages.body:
Charter Stock Rises After Another Strong Quarter for Cable  $CHTR $ATUS $T $VZ 

https://newsfilter.io/a/f0528cdecbff6315757de4e3d5c2202f

links.title: Charter Stock Rises After Another Strong Quarter for Cable
links.description: Charter Communications posted yet another quarter of strong performance and beats across the board. Subscriber growth continued at a fast clip, profit margins expanded, and share buybacks were three times as large as in the prior quarter. The business model is clearly working, and the life/work demands of Covid-19 remain a tailwind.
